message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.persistence.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'javax.persistence.*' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.support.AuditingEntityListener'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.Serializable' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.support.AuditingEntityListener'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.time.LocalDateTime' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.support.AuditingEntityListener'.
